00015 W.Creature = function(args){var self = this;
00016   this.id = 0;
00017   // position coordinate on a world
00018   this.col = 0;
00019   this.row = 0;
00020   this.act = 'hide';
00021   this.dir = 'south';
00022   // u(nit) size; 1 unit = 1 * world.unit
00023   this.uwidth = 1;
00024   this.uheight = 1;
00025   this.udepth = 1;
00026   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00027   this.frame = 0;
00028   this.maxTop = 0;
00029   this.maxLeft = 0;
00030   // sprite animation speed - the smaller, the smoother animation (more CPU time)
00031   this.speed = 6;
00032   // internal reference only (need to be private)
00033   this.actQueue = [];
00034   this.skills = [];
00035   this.add({name: 'hide', img: 'module/oracle/image/blank.gif',
00036     north: '0:0', east: '0:0', south: '0:0', west: '0:0'});
00037   // visual components
00038   this.img = document.createElement('img');
00039   this.img.title = this.id + ' : '+ this.name;
00040   this.img = W.style('img', 'position:absolute;left:-1000px');
00041   this.body = W.style('div', 'position:absolute;top:0px;left:0px;overflow:hidden');
00042   this.body.appendChild(this.img);
00043 
00050   this.resize = function(unit){
00051     this.width = this.uwidth * unit;
00052     this.height = this.uheight * unit;
00053     this.depth = this.udepth * unit;
00054     this.body.style.width = this.width +'px';
00055     this.body.style.height = this.height +'px';
00056   };
00057 
00058   this.turn = function(){
00059     var offset = this.width;
00060     switch(this.dir){  // still image set based on the direction
00061       case 'north': this.img.style.top = '0px'; break;
00062       case 'east': this.img.style.top = (-offset) +'px'; break;
00063       case 'south': this.img.style.top = (-offset * 2) +'px'; break;
00064       case 'west': this.img.style.top = (-offset * 3) +'px'; break;
00065     };
00066     this.img.style.left = '-48px';
00067   };
00068 
00069   // extend/override constructor w/ passed args object
00070   for(var i in args)
00071     eval('this.'+ i +' = args["'+ i +'"];');
00072 };

00080 W.Creature.prototype.clone = function(){
00081   var clone = new W.Creature();
00082   for(var i in this){
00083     if(i != 'body' && i != 'img' && i != 'panel')
00084       eval('clone.'+ i +' = this["'+ i +'"];');
00085   }
00086   clone.msgQueue = [];
00087   this.ifWall = 'rturn';
00088   this.ifEnemy = 'attack,walk';
00089   return clone;
00090 };

00105 W.Creature.prototype.add = function(args){
00106   // memory the latest sprite coordinate data
00107   if(this.northRule && this.northRule != '0:0')
00108     args.north = args.north?args.north:this.northRule;
00109   else this.northRule = args.north;
00110   if(this.eastRule && this.eastRule != '0:0')
00111     args.east = args.east?args.east:this.eastRule;
00112   else this.eastRule = args.east;
00113   if(this.southRule && this.southRule != '0:0')
00114     args.south = args.south?args.south:this.southRule;
00115   else this.southRule = args.south;
00116   if(this.westRule && this.westRule != '0:0')
00117     args.west = args.west?args.west:this.westRule;
00118   else this.westRule = args.west;
00119 
00120   this.skills[args.name] = [];
00121   var skill = this.skills[args.name];  // get reference
00122   skill['img'] = W.path + (args.img?args.img:'module/oracle/image/blank.gif');
00123   skill['speed'] = this.speed;
00124   if(args.north)
00125     skill['north'] = splitter(args.north);
00126   if(args.south)
00127     skill['south'] = splitter(args.south);
00128   if(args.east)
00129     skill['east'] = splitter(args.east);
00130   if(args.west)
00131     skill['west'] = splitter(args.west);
00132   // split by comma
00133   function splitter(str){
00134     var tmp = str.split(',');
00135     var arr = [];
00136     for(var i = 0; i < tmp.length; ++i){
00137       tmp[i] = tmp[i].split(':');
00138       arr[i] = {};
00139       arr[i].top = tmp[i][0];
00140       arr[i].left = tmp[i][1];
00141     }
00142     return arr;
00143   };
00144 };

00158 W.Creature.prototype.action = function(){var self = this;
00159   // hide means being invisible and no acting at all
00160   if(this.act == 'hide') return;
00161   // manage actionQueue
00162   if(this.actQueue.length != 0)  // check any reserved act
00163     this.act = this.actQueue.shift();  // check out next action
00164 
00165   switch(this.act){
00166     // change direction
00167     case 'left': this.turnTo('left'); break;
00168     case 'right': this.turnTo('right'); break;
00169     case 'backward': this.turnTo('backward'); break;
00170     case 'rturn': this.turnTo('rturn'); break;
00171     // change absolute compass
00172     case 'north': this.turnTo('north'); break;
00173     case 'east': this.turnTo('east'); break;
00174     case 'south': this.turnTo('south'); break;
00175     case 'west': this.turnTo('west'); break;
00176     case 'walk':
00177     // otherwise, change animation film
00178     default:
00179       this.img.src = this.skills[this.act]['img'];
00180   }
00181   // this.act = 'walk';
00182 
00183   // manage frame
00184   if(this.frame == this.skills[this.act][this.dir].length - 1){
00185     this.frame = 0;
00186   }else ++this.frame;
00187 
00188   // move creature
00189   var bodyPos = 0;
00190   if(this.dir == 'north' || this.dir == 'south')
00191     bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.top);
00192   else bodyPos = parseInt(this.body.style.left);
00193   var isWall = false;
00194   var act = this.skills[this.act];
00195 
00196   switch(this.dir){
00197     case 'north':
00198       this.img.style.top = -act.north[this.frame].top +'px';
00199       this.img.style.left = -act.north[this.frame].left +'px';
00200       if(this.act != 'walk') return;
00201       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00202       //window.status = bodyPos +', speed:'+ this.speed;
00203       this.body.style.zIndex = bodyPos + 10;
00204       if(bodyPos >  -this.speed) changeRow(bodyPos);
00205       else isWall = true;
00206       break;
00207     case 'east':
00208       this.img.style.top = -act.east[this.frame].top +'px';
00209       this.img.style.left = -act.east[this.frame].left +'px';
00210       if(this.act != 'walk') return;
00211       bodyPos += this.speed;
00212       if(bodyPos < this.maxLeft + this.speed) changeCol(bodyPos);
00213       else isWall = true;
00214       break;
00215     case 'south':
00216       this.img.style.top = -act.south[this.frame].top +'px';
00217       this.img.style.left = -act.south[this.frame].left +'px';
00218       if(this.act != 'walk') return;
00219       bodyPos += this.speed;
00220       this.body.style.zIndex = bodyPos + 10;
00221       if(bodyPos < this.maxTop + this.speed) changeRow(bodyPos);
00222       else isWall = true;
00223       break;
00224     case 'west':
00225       this.img.style.top = -act.west[this.frame].top +'px';
00226       this.img.style.left = -act.west[this.frame].left +'px';
00227       if(this.act != 'walk') return;
00228       bodyPos -= this.speed;
00229       if(bodyPos > -this.speed) changeCol(bodyPos);
00230       else isWall = true;
00231       break;
00232     default:
00233   }
00234   if(isWall) this.wall();
00235 
00236   // TODO handle multi-unit creatures
00237   function changeCol(left){var value = 0;
00238     if(self.dir == 'east'){
00239       value = Math.ceil(left / self.world.unit);
00240     }else if(self.dir == 'west') value = Math.floor(left / self.world.unit);
00241 
00242     if(value != self.col){
00243       var other = self.world.at(self.row, value);
00244       if(other){
00245         self.other(other);  // other creature detected
00246         return;
00247       }else{
00248         // following two lines of code should be as atomic as possible
00249         self.world.matrix[self.row][value] = self.id;
00250         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00251         self.col = value;  // change col prop.
00252       }
00253     }
00254     self.body.style.left = left +'px';  // move body
00255     self.attack = false;
00256   };
00257 
00258   function changeRow(top){var value = 0;
00259     if(self.dir == 'south'){
00260       value = Math.ceil(top / self.world.unit);
00261     }else if(self.dir == 'north') value = Math.floor(top / self.world.unit);
00262 
00263     if(value != self.row){
00264       var other = self.world.at(value, self.col);
00265       if(other){
00266         self.other(other);  // other creature detected
00267         return;
00268       }else{
00269         self.world.matrix[value][self.col] = self.id;
00270         self.world.matrix[self.row][self.col] = -1;
00271         self.row = value;  // change row prop.
00272       }
00273     }
00274     self.body.style.top = top +'px';  // move body
00275     self.attack = false;
00276   };
00277 };

00285 W.Creature.prototype.turnTo = function(dir){
00286   switch(dir){
00287     case 'rturn':
00288       var direction  = ['north', 'south', 'east', 'west'];
00289       this.dir = direction[Math.floor(Math.random() * 4)];
00290       break;
00291     case 'left':
00292       switch(this.dir){
00293         case 'north': this.dir = 'west';  break;
00294         case 'south': this.dir = 'east';  break;
00295         case 'east':  this.dir = 'north'; break;
00296         case 'west':  this.dir = 'south'; break;
00297       }; break;
00298     case 'right':
00299       switch(this.dir){
00300         case 'north': this.dir = 'east';  break;
00301         case 'south': this.dir = 'west';  break;
00302         case 'east':  this.dir = 'south'; break;
00303         case 'west':  this.dir = 'north'; break;
00304       }; break;
00305     case 'backward':
00306       switch(this.dir){
00307         case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
00308         case 'south': this.dir = 'north'; break;
00309         case 'east':  this.dir = 'west';  break;
00310         case 'west':  this.dir = 'east';  break;
00311       }; break;
00312     case 'north':
00313       this.dir = 'north'; break;
00314     case 'east':
00315       this.dir = 'east'; break;
00316     case 'south':
00317       this.dir = 'south'; break;
00318     case 'west':
00319       this.dir = 'west'; break;
00320   };
00321   this.turn();
00322   this.act = 'walk';
00323 };
00324 
00331 W.Creature.prototype.contact = function(other){
00332   switch(this.dir){
00333     case 'north':
00334       switch(other.dir){
00335         case 'north': this.dir = 'south';  break;
00336         case 'east':  this.dir = 'west'; break;
00337         case 'west':  this.dir = 'east'; break;
00338       }; break;
00339     case 'south':
00340       switch(other.dir){
00341         case 'south': this.dir = 'north';  break;
00342         case 'east':  this.dir = 'west';  break;
00343         case 'west':  this.dir = 'east'; break;
00344       }; break;
00345     case 'east':
00346       switch(other.dir){
00347         case 'east': this.dir = 'west'; break;
00348         case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
00349         case 'south':  this.dir = 'north';  break;
00350       }; break;
00351     case 'west':
00352       switch(other.dir){
00353         case 'west': this.dir = 'east'; break;
00354         case 'north': this.dir = 'south'; break;
00355         case 'south':  this.dir = 'north';  break;
00356       }; break;
00357   }
00358 };

00367 W.Creature.prototype.other = function(other){
00368   this.wall();
00369   return;
00370 };

00376 W.Creature.prototype.wall = function(){
00377   this.reserveAct(this.ifWall);
00378 };

00386 W.Creature.prototype.reserveAct = function(str){
00387   str = str?str:'walk';
00388   this.actQueue = str.split(',');
00389 };

00396 W.Creature.prototype.does = function(op){
00397   this.act = op;
00398 };
